attributes.name: Large fires (past week)
attributes.description: This layer shows fires detected in the past week with a fire radiative power (FRP) of at least 100MW.

options.cartocss: #layer { ::halo { marker-width: 20; marker-fill: #FFCC00; marker-fill-opacity: 1; marker-line-color: #f0fcaa; marker-line-width: 0; marker-line-opacity: 1; marker-placement: point; marker-type: ellipse; marker-allow-overlap: true; opacity: 0.3;} marker-width: 5; marker-fill: #ffcc00; marker-fill-opacity: 1; marker-line-color: #FFF; marker-line-width: 0; marker-line-opacity: 1; marker-placement: point; marker-type: ellipse; marker-allow-overlap: true; }
options.sql: SELECT * FROM vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d where (acq_date> (CURRENT_DATE - interval '7 day')) and frp>=100 ORDER BY frp asc

pulseConfig.url: https://api.resourcewatch.org/v1/query/20cc5eca-8c63-4c41-8e8e-134dcf1e6d76?sql=SELECT acq_date, frp FROM vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d where (acq_date> (CURRENT_DATE - interval '7 day')) and frp>=100 and st_intersects(the_geom, st_buffer(ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON('{"type":"Point","coordinates":{{point}}}'),4326),10)) ORDER BY  ST_Distance( ST_SetSRID(ST_GeomFromGeoJSON('{"type":"Point","coordinates":{{point}}}'),4326),the_geom) ASC, acq_date DESC LIMIT 1

attributes.name: All fires (past week)
attributes.description: This layer shows fires detected in the past week.

pulseConfig.sql: SELECT ST_Transform(the_geom_webmercator, 32663) as the_geom_webmercator, bright_ti4, scan, track, acq_date, acq_time, satellite, confidence, version, bright_ti5, frp, daynight FROM vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d WHERE (acq_date> (CURRENT_DATE - interval '7 day'))

options.cartocss: #layer { marker-width: 4; marker-fill: #ffcc00; marker-fill-opacity: 1; marker-line-color: #FFF; marker-line-width: 0; marker-line-opacity: 1; marker-placement: point; marker-type: ellipse; marker-allow-overlap: true; }
options.sql: SELECT * FROM vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d where (acq_date> (CURRENT_DATE - interval '7 day')) ORDER BY frp asc

attributes.name: Fire Alerts (VIIRS)
attributes.description: Displays fire alert data for the past 24 hours, 48 hours, 72 hours, or 7 days

options.cartocss: #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d { marker-fill: #FFCC00; marker-width: 2.5; marker-line-color: #FFF; marker-line-width: 1; marker-line-opacity: 1; marker-opacity: 0.9; marker-comp-op: multiply; marker-type: ellipse; marker-placement: point; marker-allow-overlap: true; marker-clip: false; marker-multi-policy: largest; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>6]{ marker-width: 3; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>8]{ marker-width: 6; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>11]{ marker-width: 13; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>12]{ marker-width: 25; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>13]{ marker-width: 50; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>14]{ marker-width: 100; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>15]{ marker-width: 200; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>16]{ marker-width: 400; } #vnp14imgt_nrt_global_7d[zoom>17]{ marker-width: 800; }
options.sql: SELECT cartodb_id, the_geom_webmercator, (SUBSTR(acq_time, 1, 2) || ':' || SUBSTR(acq_time, 3, 4)) as acq_time,  COALESCE(to_char(acq_date, 'DD Mon, YYYY')) as acq_date, confidence, bright_ti4 brightness, longitude, latitude FROM vnp14imgtdl_nrt_global_7d where (acq_date >= (CURRENT_DATE - interval '{{number_of_days}} day')) AND confidence != 'low'

info.description: Displays fire alert data for the past 24 hours, 48 hours, 72 hours, or 7 days.
info.name: Fire Alerts (VIIRS)
